46             roles_sql = f"""

48                     rolname as username,
49                     rolsuper as is_superuser,
50                     rolcreaterole as can_create_role,
51                     rolcreatedb as can_create_db,
52                     rolreplication as can_replicate,
53                     rolbypassrls as can_bypass_rls,
54                     rolcanlogin as can_login,
55                     rolinherit as can_inherit,
56                     CASE
57                         WHEN rolvaliduntil = 'infinity'::timestamp THEN NULL
58                         WHEN rolvaliduntil = '-infinity'::timestamp THEN NULL

60                     END as valid_until
61                 FROM pg_roles
62                 WHERE {where_clause}
63                 ORDER BY rolname
64             """

results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.

results.code:
100             # 1. 批量获取所有登录基本信息
101             login_sql = f"""
102                 SELECT
103                     sp.name as username,
104                     sp.is_disabled as is_disabled,
105                     sp.type_desc as login_type,
106                     sp.type as type,
107                     sp.create_date as create_date,
108                     sp.modify_date as modify_date,
109                     sp.sid as sid,
110                     CASE
111                         WHEN sp.type = 'S' THEN LOGINPROPERTY(sp.name, 'PasswordLastSetTime')
112                         ELSE NULL
113                     END as password_last_set_time,
114                     CASE
115                         WHEN sp.type = 'S' THEN sl.is_expiration_checked
116                         ELSE NULL
117                     END as is_expiration_checked,
118                     CASE
119                         WHEN sp.type = 'S' THEN sl.is_policy_checked
120                         ELSE NULL
121                     END as is_policy_checked
122                 FROM sys.server_principals sp
123                 LEFT JOIN sys.sql_logins sl ON sp.principal_id = sl.principal_id AND sp.type = 'S'
124                 WHERE sp.type IN ('S', 'U', 'G') AND {where_clause}
125                 ORDER BY sp.name
126             """
127
results.issue_text: Possible SQL injection vector through string-based query construction.
